nodes.text: The Esraza Temple was an exotic structure located on the planet Oligtaz. It was believed by early explorers to be a location of reality-warping where visitors could be imbued with the powers of teleportation and foresight. Modern explorers believed the shrine to have been atop a cavern of lumni-spice. It was included in the list of the Twenty Wonders of the Galaxy by the historian Vicendi in 10,000 BBY. By the time of the Galactic Civil War, it was in ruins.
